document.full_text: real salt lake's javier morales, one of the top players in major league soccer, sustained a broken left ankle saturday in a match against chivas usa at rio tinto stadium in sandy, utah.
document.title: another m.l.s. star seriously injured
lines_and_colors: real salt lake's javier morales, one of the top players in major league soccer, sustained a broken left ankle saturday in a match against chivas usa at rio tinto stadium in sandy, utah.
